## ğŸ¨ **Visual Indicator Enhancement**

### **âœ… Animated Cloud Sync Icon (NEW)**

**Implementation**:
```kotlin
when (syncState) {
    SyncState.Syncing -> {
        // ğŸ”„ Rotating sync icon with 1-second animation
        val rotation by infiniteTransition.animateFloat(
            initialValue = 0f, targetValue = 360f,
            animationSpec = infiniteRepeatable(tween(1000, LinearEasing))
        )
        Text("ğŸ”„", modifier = Modifier.graphicsLayer { rotationZ = rotation })
    }
    SyncState.Done -> Text("âœ…")    // Check mark
    SyncState.Error -> Text("âŒ")   // X mark  
    else -> Text("â˜ï¸")              // Cloud idle
}
```

**Visual States**:
- **â˜ï¸ Idle**: Static cloud (waiting for changes)
- **ğŸ”„ Syncing**: Animated rotating arrows (smooth 1s rotation)
- **âœ… Done**: Green check mark (sync complete)
- **âŒ Error**: Red X mark (sync failed)

**User Experience**:
- âœ… **Immediate feedback** - Icon changes instantly on user action
- âœ… **Clear visual language** - Intuitive status understanding
- âœ… **Smooth animation** - Professional rotating sync indicator
- âœ… **Non-intrusive** - Doesn't interfere with main UI

| No backup found | RestoreGate message | âœ… "No cloud backup found" | âœ… EXPECTED |

### **âœ… Why "No Cloud Backup Found" is Correct**

**This is Expected Behavior**:
1. **Drive API is mocked** - Not actually connecting to real Drive
2. **Mock always returns null** - Simulates no backup found
3. **RestoreGate shows correct message** - "No cloud backup found"
4. **User can continue** - App functions normally

**When Drive API is enabled**:
- Real backup.json will be found in Drive appDataFolder
- RestoreGate will show "Cloud backup found" with Restore/Skip options
- Sync will upload real data to Google Drive
